Description:
Dermatologist (Specialist) Qualifications:Bachelors Degree of Medicine (or equivalent)
Certificate of completion of structured post-graduate training + passing board exam
Minimum 3 years clinical experience after post graduate training in government or semi government institutions or hospitals that provide post graduate training programs Passed DHP qualifying exam (Prometric Exam)
With Dataflow (Verification Report)Job Description:Evaluating patient health skin condition. Consultation and prescribing the appropriate medicine. Perform laser hair removal procedures and other dermatological procedures.
Knowledgeable in performing filler injections, Botox, mesotherapy, PRP, Dermapen/ microneedling, cautery and other cosmetological procedures. Performs Velashape, HIFU Treatment, Hydrafacial, Regenera hair loss treatment, and Facial Cleaning. Performs non-invasive surgical procedures. Referring patients to advanced medical specialist.Skills
